instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3437 not booting
threads.message:
Hello, I have a Mac Air 13inch that will not boot up. It Chimes and hangs about 1/3 of the booting process at Apple logo. I am able to run a hardware test and the result attached. Have tried a working SSD as well as an external one but same issue and same result in AHT. Same for the BT module. Any suggestions?

EDIT: no liquid spil after careful inspection in microscope. The mac just stopped. Just now i changed the BT/WIFI Module and drive for another 100% working one and ran another test, no issues found now. But still hanging at boot at 1/3 to 50% of the bar. Safe boot gives the same issue.

threads.title: 820-3437 not booting
threads.message: Yeah, someone messed with the BIOS!

threads.title: 820-3437 not booting
threads.message:
ok will try to see if we can flash it

PS it wasnt me! :P

threads.title: 820-3437 not booting
threads.message: Read original and compare serial numbers with the case. If you upload the original dump here I can fix the ME if needed.
